diff.sql:
CREATE TABLE `usagestatistics_usage` ( `usage_id` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `user_id` int(11) default NULL, `patient_id` int(11) default NULL, `timestamp` datetime NOT NULL, `created` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `updated` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `voided` tinyint(1) NOT NULL default '0', `found_by` int(4) NOT NULL default '0', `query` varchar(50) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY USING BTREE (`usage_id`), KEY `user_id` (`user_id`), KEY `patient_id` (`patient_id`), CONSTRAINT `usagestats_usage_patient` FOREIGN KEY (`patient_id`) REFERENCES `patient` (`patient_id`), CONSTRAINT `usagestats_usage_user` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `users` (`user_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
CREATE TABLE `usagestatistics_daily` ( `date` date NOT NULL, `user_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `location_id` int(11) default NULL, `usages` int(5) NOT NULL default '0', `creates` int(5) NOT NULL default '0', `updates` int(5) NOT NULL default '0', `voids` int(5) NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`date`,`user_id`), KEY `usagestatistics_daily_location` (`location_id`), KEY `usagestatistics_daily_user` (`user_id`), CONSTRAINT `usagestatistics_daily_location` FOREIGN KEY (`location_id`) REFERENCES `location` (`location_id`), CONSTRAINT `usagestatistics_daily_user` FOREIGN KEY (`user_id`) REFERENCES `users` (`user_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
